playbook.name: Battleborn
playbook.description: You may expend your **special armor** to reduce harm from an attack in combat or to **push yourself** during a fight.

playbook.name: Bodyguard
playbook.description: When you **protect** a teammate, take **+1d** to your resistance roll. When you gather info to anticipate possible threats in the current situation, you get **+1 effect**.

playbook.name: Arcane Fighter
playbook.description: You may imbue your hands, melee weapons, or tools with spirit energy. You gain **potency** in combat vs. the supernatural.

playbook.name: Leader
playbook.description: When you **Command** a **cohort** in combat, they continue to fight when they would otherwise **break** (they’re not taken out when they suffer level 3 harm). They gain **+1 effect** and **1 armor**.

playbook.name: Mule
playbook.description: Your load limits are higher. Light: 5. Normal: 7. Heavy: 8.

playbook.name: Not to be trifled with
playbook.description:
You can **push yourself** to do one of the following:
- perform a feat of physical force that verges on the superhuman
— engage a small gang on equal footing in close combat.

playbook.name: Savage
playbook.description: When you unleash physical violence, it’s especially frightening. When you **Command** a frightened target, take **+1d**.

playbook.name: Vigorous
playbook.description: You recover from harm faster. Permanently fill in one of your healing clock segments. Take **+1d** to healing treatment rolls.

playbook.name: Sharpshooter
playbook.description:
You can **push yourself** to do one of the following:
- make a ranged attack at extreme distance beyond what’s normal for the weapon
— unleash a barrage of rapid fire to suppress the enemy.

playbook.name: Focused
playbook.description: You may expend your **special armor** to resist a consequence of surprise or mental harm (fear, confusion, losing track of someone) or to **push yourself** for ranged combat or tracking.

playbook.name: Ghost hound
playbook.description:
Your hunting pet is imbued with spirit energy. It gains **potency** when tracking or fighting the supernatural. It also gains a supernatural ability:
- Ghost-form
- Mind-link
- Arrow-swift
Take this ability again to gain another supernatural ability for your pet.

playbook.name: Scout
playbook.description: When you gather information to discover the location of a target, you get **+1 effect**. When you hide in a prepared position or use camouflage you get **+1d** to rolls to avoid detection.

playbook.name: Tough as nails
playbook.description: Penalties from harm are one level less severe (though level 4 harm is still fatal).

playbook.name: Vengeful
playbook.description: You gain an additional **xp trigger**: You got payback against someone who harmed you or someone you care about. If your crew helped you get payback, also mark crew xp.

playbook.name: Alchemist
playbook.description: When you **invent** or **craft** a creation with alchemical features, you get **+1 result level** to your roll (a **1-3** becomes a **4/5**, etc.). You begin with one special formula already known.

playbook.name: Analyst
playbook.description: During downtime, you get **two ticks** to distribute among any long term project clocks that involve investigation or learning a new formula or design plan.

playbook.name: Artificer
playbook.description: When you **invent** or **craft** a creation with spark-craft features, you get **+1 result level** to your roll (a **1-3** becomes a **4/5**, etc.). You begin with one special design already known.

playbook.name: Fortitude
playbook.description: You may expend your **special armor** to resist a consequence of fatigue, weakness, or chemical effects, or to **push yourself** when working with technical skill or handling alchemicals.

playbook.name: Supernatural Ward
playbook.description: When you **Wreck** an area with arcane substances, ruining it for any other use, it becomes anathema or enticing to the supernatural (your choice).

playbook.name: Saboteur
playbook.description: When you **Wreck**, your work is much quieter than it should be and the damage is very well-hidden from casual inspection.

playbook.name: Venomous
playbook.description: Choose a drug or poison (from your bandolier stock) to which you have become immune. You can **push yourself** to secrete it through your skin or saliva or exhale it as a vapor.

playbook.name: Infiltrator
playbook.description: You are not affected by **quality** or **tier** when you bypass security measures.

playbook.name: Ambush
playbook.description: When you attack from hiding or spring a trap you get **+1d**.

playbook.name: Daredevil
playbook.description: When you roll a desperate action, you get **+1d** to your roll if you also take **-1d** to any resistance rolls against consequences from your action.

playbook.name: The devil's footsteps
playbook.description:
When you **push yourself**, choose one of the following additional benefits:
- perform a feat of athletics that verges on the superhuman
- manouver to confuse your enemies so they mistakenly attack each other

playbook.name: Expertise
playbook.description: Choose one of your action ratings. When you lead a **group action** using that action you can suffer at most 1 stress.

playbook.name: Ghost veil
playbook.description:
You may shift partially into the ghost field, becoming shadowy and insubstantial for a few moments. Take 2 stress when you shift, plus 1 stress for each extra feature:
- It lasts for a few minutes rather than a few moments
- You are invisible rather than shadowy
- You can float through the air like a ghost

playbook.name: Reflexes
playbook.description: When there's a question about who acts first the answer is you. (Two characters with Reflexes act simultaniously)

playbook.name: Shadow
playbook.description: You may expend your **special armor** to resist a consequence from detection or security measures, or **push yourself** for a feat of athletics or stealth.

playbook.name: Rook's Gambit
playbook.description: Take **2 stress** to roll your best action rating while performning a different action. Say how you adaot your skill to this use.

playbook.name: Cloak & Dagger
playbook.descirption: WHen you use a disguise or other form of covert misdirection, you get **+1d** to rolls to confuse or deflect suspicion. When you throw off your disguise the resulting suprise gives you the initiative in the situation.

playbook.name: Ghost Voice
playbook.description: You know the secret method to interact with a ghost or demon as if it was a normal human, regardless of how wild or feral it appears. You gain **potency** when communicating with the supernatural.

playbook.name: Like looking into a mirror
playbook.description: You can always tell when someone is lying to you.

playbook.name: A little something on the side
playbook.description: At the end of each downtime phase, you earn **+2 stash**.

playbook.name: Mesmerism
playbook.description: When you **Sway** someone, you may cause them to forget that it's happened until they next interect with you.

playbook.name: Subterfuge
playbook.description: You may expend your **special armor** to resist a consequence from suspicion pr persuasion, or to **push yourself** for subterfuge.

playbook.name: Trust in me
playbook.description: You get **+1d** vs a target with whom you have an intimate relationship.

playbook.name: Foresight
playbook.description: Two times per score you can **assist** a teammate without paying stress. Tell us how you prepared for this.

playbook.name: Calculating
playbook.description: Due to your careful planning, during **downtime** you may give yourself or another crew member +1 downtime action.

playbook.name: Connected
playbook.description: During downtime, you get **+1 result level** when you **aquire an asset** or **reduce heat**.

playbook.name: Functioning Vice
playbook.description: WHen you indulge your vice, you may adjust the dice outcome by 1 or 2 (up or down). An ally who joins you in your vice may do the same.

playbook.name: Ghost Contract
playbook.description: When you shake on a deal, you and your partner - human or otherwise - both bear a mark of your oath. If either breaks the contract they take level 3 harm, "Cursed".

playbook.name: Jail Bird
playbook.description: When **incarcerated**, your wanted level counts as 1 less, Your Tier as 1 more, and you gain +1 faction status with a faction you help on the inside (in addition to your incarceration roll).

playbook.name: Mastermind
playbook.description: You may expend your **special armor** to protect a teammate, or to **push yourself** when you gather information or work on a long-term project.

playbook.name: Weaving the Web
playbook.description: You gain **+1d** to **Consort** when you **gather information on a target for a score. You get **+1d** to the **engagement roll** for that operation.

playbook.name: Compel
playbook.description: You can **Attune** to the ghost field to force a nearby ghost to appear and obey a command you give it. You are not supernaturally terrified by a ghost you summon or compel (though your allies may be).

playbook.name: Ghost Mind
playbook.description: You're always aware of supernatural entities in your presence. Take **+1d** when you **gather info** about the supernatural.

playbook.name: Iron Will
playbook.description: You're immune to the terror that some supernatural entities inflict on sight. Take **+1d** to resistance rolls with **Resolve**.

playbook.name: Occultist
playbook.description: You know the secret ways to **Consort** with ancient powers. forgotten gods or demons. Once you've consorted with one, you get **+1d** to **command** cultists who worship it.

playbook.name: Ritual
playbook.description: You can **Study** an occult ritual (or create a new one) to summon a supernatural entity or being. You know the arcane methods to perform ritual sorcery. You begin with one ritual already laerned.

playbook.name: Strange Methods
playbook.description: When you invent or craft a creation with *arcane* features, take **+1 result level** to your roll. You begin with one arcane design already known.

playbook.name: Tempest
playbook.description:
You can **Push yourself** to do one of the following:
- unleash a stroke of lightning as a weapon
- summon a storm in your immediate vicinity (torrential rain, roaring winds, heavy fog, chilling frost/snow etc.).

playbook.name: Warded
playbook.description: You may expend your **special armor** to resist a supernatural consequence, or to **push yourself** when you deal with arcane forces.
